mapper.select:
select x.stnd_dt from (select case when #{perdDivCd} = 'MONTH' then to_char(to_date(stnd_yymm , 'YYYYMM') , 'YYYY-MM') when #{perdDivCd} = 'WEEK' then to_char(to_date(stnd_yymm , 'YYYYMM') , '`YY.MM') || ' ' || mnth_week_seq ||'주차' when #{perdDivCd} = 'WEEK_NM' then week_nm else to_char(to_date(stnd_dt , 'YYYYMMDD') , 'YYYY-MM-DD') end as stnd_dt from tt_alam_stss where 1=1
and stnd_dt between REPLACE(#{stndDtFr},'-','') and REPLACE(#{stndDtTo},'-','')
and stnd_yymm between REPLACE(#{stndMmFr},'-','') and REPLACE(#{stndMmTo},'-','')
and alam_type_cd = #{alamTypeCd}
) x
inner join tc_cd_spec tcs on x.stnd_dt = tcs.cd_val and tcs.cd_grp = 'WEEK_CD' where 1=1 group by x.stnd_dt , tcs.sort_ord order by tcs.sort_ord , x.stnd_dt
group by x.stnd_dt order by x.stnd_dt

select x.stnd_dt ,x.alam_type_cd ,fn_getCdnm('ALAM_TYPE_CD' , x.alam_type_cd ) as alam_type_nm ,sum(x.alam_cnt) as alam_cnt from (select case when #{perdDivCd} = 'MONTH' then to_char(to_date(stnd_yymm , 'YYYYMM') , 'YYYY-MM') when #{perdDivCd} = 'WEEK' then to_char(to_date(stnd_yymm , 'YYYYMM') , '`YY.MM') || ' ' || mnth_week_seq ||'주차' when #{perdDivCd} = 'WEEK_NM' then week_nm else to_char(to_date(stnd_dt , 'YYYYMMDD') , 'YYYY-MM-DD') end as stnd_dt ,alam_type_cd ,alam_cnt from tt_alam_stss where 1=1
and stnd_dt between REPLACE(#{stndDtFr},'-','') and REPLACE(#{stndDtTo},'-','')
and stnd_yymm between REPLACE(#{stndMmFr},'-','') and REPLACE(#{stndMmTo},'-','')
and alam_type_cd = #{alamTypeCd}
) x
inner join tc_cd_spec tcs on x.stnd_dt = tcs.cd_val and tcs.cd_grp = 'WEEK_CD' where 1=1 group by x.stnd_dt, x.alam_type_cd, tcs.sort_ord order by tcs.sort_ord, x.alam_type_cd, x.stnd_dt
group by x.stnd_dt , x.alam_type_cd order by x.alam_type_cd, x.stnd_dt
